\n<h6 data-start=""207"" data-end=""263""><strong data-start=""212"" data-end=""261"">HAIROTICMEN Sulfate Free ConditionerÂ </strong></h6>
\n<ul data-start=""2507"" data-end=""3034"">
\n 	<li class="""" data-start=""2917"" data-end=""3034"">

\n<h3 class="""" data-start=""1904"" data-end=""1932""><strong>Anwendungsempfehlung:</strong></h3>
\n<p class="""" data-start=""1934"" data-end=""1989"">Gesicht nach der Rasur mit Wasser reinigen &amp; abtrocknen</p>
\n<p class="""" data-start=""1991"" data-end=""2039"">Kleine Menge Aftershave in die HandflÃ¤chen geben</p>
\n<p class="""" data-start=""2041"" data-end=""2082"">Sanft auf Wangen, Hals und Kinn auftragen</p>
\n<p class="""" data-start=""2084"" data-end=""2133"">Kurz einwirken lassen und Duft &amp; Frische genieÃŸen</p>
\n<p class="""" data-start=""2135"" data-end=""2230"">ðŸ’¡ <strong data-start=""2138"" data-end=""2155"">Styling-Tipp:</strong> FÃ¼r intensiveren Effekt das Aftershave sanft einklopfen â€“ nicht verreiben.</p>

--- SOURCE: External_Automation_Zapier_Flows.docx ---

External Automation â€“ Zapier Flows Documentation (HAIROTICMEN)This document details the complete external automation layer for HAIROTICMEN, implemented via **Zapier**. These automations connect external marketing, communication, and productivity platforms â€” including Meta Ads, Google Ads, Gmail, Slack, WhatsApp Business, YouTube, and Odoo CRM â€” into the central intelligence network managed by **Hairo Assistant**. Zapier serves as the outer communication bridge for customer interaction, campaign execution, and partner communication beyond the OVH environment.1) Purpose &amp; ScopeThe Zapier automation layer extends the capabilities of the internal n8n automations by enabling secure cloud-based integrations with third-party SaaS systems that cannot directly connect to the OVH server. Its purpose is to execute marketing, communication, and customer engagement tasks while maintaining brand consistency and data integrity.2) Core Integration PlatformsZapier connects to and orchestrates:  â€¢ Meta (Facebook &amp; Instagram Ads Manager).  â€¢ Google Ads &amp; YouTube Studio.  â€¢ Gmail &amp; Google Workspace tools.  â€¢ Slack &amp; WhatsApp Business (Twilio or Meta Cloud API).  â€¢ TikTok Ads &amp; TikTok for Business.  â€¢ Monday.com (for public campaign reporting).  â€¢ Odoo CRM (lead intake &amp; feedback loop).  â€¢ Google Drive (asset storage and log archiving).  3) Design Principlesâ€¢ One-way outbound automation for security isolation.  â€¢ All Zapier actions mirrored in internal logs via n8n for traceability.  â€¢ Brand and tone enforcement through centralized content templates in Drive.  â€¢ Error handling and fallbacks route to Hairo Assistant via MCP.  â€¢ Monthly export of all active Zaps for compliance auditing.  4) Workflow CategoriesZapier automations are organized into seven main categories:  1. Lead Intake &amp; CRM Sync  2. Marketing Campaign Management  3. Social Media Content Distribution  4. Customer Communication (Email, WhatsApp, Slack)  5. Partner Notifications &amp; Loyalty Updates  6. Reputation &amp; Feedback Monitoring  7. Reporting &amp; Analytics Delivery  5) Key Zapier Flow SpecificationsA) Meta Ads â†’ Odoo CRM Lead IntakeTrigger: New lead submitted from Facebook or Instagram Ad Form.  Flow Steps:  1. Retrieve form submission data.  2. Validate required fields and consent checkbox.  3. Create or update lead in Odoo CRM (external_id='meta:{lead_id}').  4. Notify Sales AI for follow-up.  5. Save copy of submission in Drive /Marketing/Leads/YYYY-MM/.  6. Log completion in Monday â€œLead Intakeâ€ board.  B) Google Ads â†’ ROI Analysis ReportTrigger: Weekly schedule (Monday 08:00 CET).  Flow Steps:  1. Fetch campaign data from Google Ads (CTR, conversions, spend).  2. Compare performance vs. previous week using Drive metrics.  3. Generate summary table â†’ export as â€œAd_Performance_{week}.xlsxâ€.  4. Send email report to management via Gmail.  5. Update Marketing AI for learning dataset.  C) Gmail â†’ Odoo CRM Communication LogTrigger: New email received (inbox: Sales or Support).  Flow Steps:  1. Extract sender, subject, and thread context.  2. Match contact with Odoo CRM partner.  3. Create CRM activity entry under that record.  4. Attach email body as note (Drive archive optional).  5. Trigger MCP â€œcommunication_loggedâ€ event for AI insight update.  D) WhatsApp Business â†’ CRM &amp; SupportTrigger: Incoming WhatsApp message via Meta Cloud API.  Flow Steps:  1. Detect message type (text, image, voice).  2. Match sender to partner/customer in Odoo CRM.  3. Create new ticket if keyword detected (e.g., â€œsupportâ€, â€œreturnâ€, â€œdealerâ€).  4. Notify Sales or Logistics AI depending on category.  5. Auto-reply via template messages (Drive /Templates/WhatsApp/).  E) TikTok â†’ Social Analytics DashboardTrigger: Daily schedule (23:00 CET).  Flow Steps:  1. Retrieve analytics (views, engagement, CTR).  2. Aggregate with Meta &amp; YouTube data.  3. Update Monday â€œSocial Analyticsâ€ board.  4. Store JSON response in Drive /Reports/Social_Metrics/YYYY-MM-DD.json.  5. Trigger Marketing AI â€œanalytics_updatedâ€ event.  F) Reputation &amp; Feedback MonitoringTrigger: New review posted on Google Maps or Meta Page.  Flow Steps:  1. Fetch review content &amp; rating.  2. Analyze sentiment using integrated AI sentiment model.  3. If negative (&lt;3 stars):     â€“ Create incident ticket in CRM.     â€“ Notify Hairo Assistant for escalation.  4. If positive: add to Drive /Marketing/Testimonials/.  6) Data Flow SummaryTypical Flow Direction:  External Platform (Meta, Google, TikTok, WhatsApp) â†’ Zapier â†’ Odoo CRM â†’ Drive â†’ Monday â†’ Hairo Assistant.  Reverse actions (CRM â†’ Zapier â†’ platform) only allowed for outbound notifications or ad budget adjustments.  Data enrichment and AI context updates occur through MCP message passing.  7) Error Handling &amp; Fallbacksâ€¢ Retry policy: 3 attempts (2m / 5m / 10m).  â€¢ Failures pushed to n8n fallback endpoint (/api/zapier_fallback).  â€¢ AI escalation via MCP â€œalert_zap_failedâ€.  â€¢ Monday â€œAutomation Incidentsâ€ board receives failed Zap summary.  â€¢ Errors older than 30 days archived in Drive /Logs/Zapier_Errors/.  8) Security &amp; Access Controlâ€¢ OAuth 2.0 authentication for all platform connections.  â€¢ Token rotation every 90 days; refresh automated via Zapier Secrets Manager.  â€¢ Sensitive data (names, phone numbers) redacted before logging.  â€¢ Only outbound operations allowed to Odoo CRM; no direct access to server database.  â€¢ GDPR-compliant retention: logs retained 12 months; sensitive data masked.  9) Monitoring &amp; Reportingâ€¢ Zapier Activity History synced daily to Drive /Logs/Zapier_History/.  â€¢ Hairo Assistant receives daily report summarizing:    â€“ Total successful runs    â€“ Failure rate (%)    â€“ Top Zaps by execution volume  â€¢ Monthly analytics report auto-generated for management review.  10) Governance &amp; Versioningâ€¢ All active Zaps exported monthly to Drive /Governance/Zapier_Exports/.  â€¢ Naming Convention: {Category}_{Flow}_v{major.minor}.zap.  â€¢ Linked to AI departmental versions (e.g., AI-MARKETING-v2.1).  â€¢ Change requests logged in Drive /Governance/Zapier_Change_Log.xlsx.  â€¢ Quarterly security audit led by Hairo Assistant.  
--- SOURCE: Internal_Automation_n8n_Flows.docx ---

Internal Automation â€“ n8n Flows Documentation (HAIROTICMEN)This document describes the complete internal automation layer for HAIROTICMEN, implemented via n8n running on the OVH private server. All automations execute operational tasks between Odoo ERP, WooCommerce, myCred, SliceWP, CRM, and Google Drive. These flows are orchestrated under the supervision of Hairo Assistant via the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and form the execution backbone of the brandâ€™s intelligent infrastructure.1) Architecture Overviewn8n serves as the internal workflow engine responsible for data synchronization, automation of repetitive operations, report generation, and system integrations. It connects directly to HAIROTICMENâ€™s self-hosted Odoo, WooCommerce APIs, and Google Drive. Each workflow (flow) is fully version-controlled, logged, and monitored for performance and compliance.2) Design Principlesâ€¢ Event-driven execution (webhooks, schedules, triggers).  â€¢ Idempotent operations using external_id references.  â€¢ All workflows tagged by department and versioned in Google Drive (/Governance/n8n_Flows/).  â€¢ Error recovery, retries, and DLQ (Dead Letter Queue) mechanism.  â€¢ End-to-end traceability: each run carries correlation_id and source metadata.  â€¢ Human-in-the-loop (HITL) approval for sensitive financial or policy actions.  3) Core System Connectionsâ€¢ Odoo ERP: REST API + XMLRPC for accounting, sales, stock, and CRM modules.  â€¢ WooCommerce: REST API for orders, products, and customers.  â€¢ myCred: REST API for points and loyalty ledger management.  â€¢ SliceWP: REST API for affiliate conversions and payout verification.  â€¢ Google Drive: OAuth service connection for document logging and report storage.  â€¢ Monday.com: API (read-only for most flows, write for summary metrics).  â€¢ MCP Proxy: JSON-RPC interface for Hairo Assistant command routing.  4) Key Workflow CategoriesAll n8n workflows are categorized into six main groups aligned with departmental AIs:1. Sales Automation  2. Accounting &amp; Finance Automation  3. Logistics &amp; Warehouse Automation  4. Partner &amp; Loyalty Automation  5. Marketing Reporting Automation  6. Administrative &amp; Governance Automation  5) Example Workflow SpecificationsBelow are representative n8n flow designs and logic for key business processes.A) Woo â†’ Odoo Order SyncTrigger: WooCommerce webhook (order.created / order.paid)  Flow Steps:  1. Validate payload integrity.  2. Search Odoo for existing order (external_id='woo:{order_id}').  3. If not found â†’ create sales order in Odoo with mapped lines, tax, and partner.  4. Confirm sale and post invoice if payment verified.  5. Generate PDF invoice â†’ upload to Google Drive /Finance/Invoices/YYYY-MM/.  6. Log event to Monday â€œSales â€“ Orders Syncedâ€ board.  B) Invoice Archival &amp; USt ReportTrigger: Odoo event (invoice.posted).  Flow Steps:  1. Retrieve posted invoice via Odoo API.  2. Generate PDF and archive to Drive under /Finance/Invoices/.  3. Extract VAT data and update monthly USt-Voranmeldung table in Drive.  4. Notify Accounting AI via MCP event â€œinvoice_archivedâ€.  5. Log run summary (invoice_id, timestamp, VAT value).  C) Stock ReconciliationTrigger: Scheduled hourly.  Flow Steps:  1. Pull Odoo stock.quant (warehouse levels).  2. Compare with WooCommerce product inventory (via SKU).  3. Update WooCommerce stock when deviation &gt; threshold (5%).  4. Notify Logistics AI and record variance report in Drive /Operations/Stock_Audit/.  5. Create Monday entry for discrepancies &gt;10 units.  D) Loyalty Points AllocationTrigger: WooCommerce â€œorder.deliveredâ€.  Flow Steps:  1. Identify customer and partner accounts.  2. Calculate myCred base points (per product or rule).  3. Apply bonuses based on tier (Partner Programs AI policy).  4. Update myCred ledger and sync to Odoo via odoo.points_adjust.  5. Write summary log to Drive /Loyalty/Transactions/YYYY-MM/.  E) Affiliate Payout GenerationTrigger: SliceWP conversion.status=â€œapprovedâ€.  Flow Steps:  1. Retrieve conversion details (amount, date, affiliate_id).  2. Compute payout using Drive /Partner_Policies/Commissions.xlsx.  3. Create payout record in Odoo (external_id='aff:{conversion_id}').  4. Notify Accounting AI for payment confirmation.  5. Update Monday â€œAffiliate Paymentsâ€ board.  F) Daily Backups &amp; ReportsTrigger: Every midnight.  Flow Steps:  1. Export key datasets (orders, invoices, points, conversions).  2. Upload to Drive /Backups/Daily/YYYY-MM-DD/.  3. Summarize counts in Monday â€œOps â€“ System Healthâ€ board.  4. Trigger MCP event for AI performance metrics collection.  6) Error Handling &amp; DLQâ€¢ Retries: 3 automatic retries (30s, 2m, 5m).  â€¢ Errors pushed to DLQ (Drive /Logs/DLQ/).  â€¢ n8n sends MCP alert to Hairo Assistant for escalation.  â€¢ Monday â€œAutomation Incidentsâ€ board receives failed run summary.  â€¢ DLQ entries older than 14 days auto-archived.  7) Security &amp; Accessâ€¢ Credentials stored in n8n Secret Vault (AES-256 encryption).  â€¢ Each node uses least-privilege credentials (read/write separation).  â€¢ HTTPS enforced for all connections.  â€¢ All logs contain correlation_id; sensitive fields masked (email, phone).  â€¢ Manual approvals for high-value invoice postings or partner payouts.  8) Monitoring &amp; Alertsâ€¢ n8n sends daily operational summary to Monday via API.  â€¢ Alerts triggered when success rate &lt; 98%.  â€¢ Hairo Assistant reviews n8n logs weekly for optimization.  â€¢ Health Check API (/status) monitored by external uptime service.  9) Governance &amp; Versioningâ€¢ All flows exported weekly to Drive (/Governance/n8n_Flows/Exports/).  â€¢ Naming Convention: {Department}_{Process}_v{major.minor}.json.  â€¢ Version tags aligned with AI departmental versions (e.g., AI-SALES-v2.3 â†’ Flow v2.3).  â€¢ Change requests require testing in STAGING environment before production.  â€¢ Quarterly automation audit under Hairo Assistant oversight.

==== AI Marketing Agents ====
--- SOURCE: HAIROTICMEN_Partner_Types_Levels_Contracts_Marketing_EN.docx ---

ðŸ“Š HAIROTICMEN â€“ PARTNER TYPES, LEVELS &amp; CONTRACTUAL SYSTEMðŸ§© 1. Partner Types Overview1. Handle Dealers (Retail B2B)   - Purchase products in moderate volume   - Resell in physical shops or online   - Entry-level discount and flexible terms2. Wholesalers / Distributors   - Purchase in bulk for regional resale   - May supply sub-retailers or salon chains   - Require larger volume and legal structure3. Exclusive Regional Partners   - Given exclusive city/region rights   - Must meet sales quota and represent brand   - High loyalty and co-branding support4. Salons / Barbershops (Salon Partners)   - Use and resell HAIROTICMEN in-salon   - Small orders with strong brand presence   - Receive display stands, samples, and materials5. Affiliates / Online Resellers   - Earn commission on referrals or online sales   - Must respect MSRP and approval policies   - Tracked using SliceWP system6. Sales Agents / Brand Ambassadors   - Work commission-based to introduce retailers   - Represent brand at events or markets   - Paid via affiliate-like system + bonusesðŸ“ˆ 2. Partner Levels (Applies to Handle/Wholesale)| Level     | Min Invoice (â‚¬) | Discount | Loyalty Points | Key Perks                        ||-----------|------------------|----------|----------------|----------------------------------|| Starter   | 0                | 30%      | Yes            | Access to basic dashboard        || Silver    | 2,500            | 35%      | Yes            | Sample Kit + Monthly Insights    || Gold      | 5,000            | 40%      | Yes            | Display Stand + Ads Co-Support   || Platinum  | 10,000           | 45%      | Yes            | Geo-exclusivity + Manager Access || Container | 15,000+          | 50â€“55%   | Yes            | Contract-based rates + CIF/FOB   |ðŸ“œ 3. Contractual StructureStandard Partner Contract (Silver+)- VAT compliance + company registry- Adherence to MSRP (UVP)- Loyalty reward terms- Shipping/payment terms- Optional exclusivity clausePlatinum &amp; Exclusive Contracts- Dedicated region (postal code locking)- Mandatory quarterly volumes- Shared marketing responsibility- Breach policy + downgrade/termination rulesContainer Buyer Agreements- One-time volume pricing- 50% advance payment, 50% pre-shipment- Separate invoice terms- Additional clauses for damage, insurance, late paymentðŸ§° 4. Marketing AI Agent Documentation â€“ HAIROTICMENThis document describes the complete operational, creative, and analytical framework of the Marketing AI Agent within the HAIROTICMEN centralized AI ecosystem. The Marketing AI Agent, governed by Hairo Assistant, manages omnichannel campaigns, brand communications, social media automation, and ROI analytics across all digital platforms.1) Mission and ObjectivesThe Marketing AI Agent aims to strengthen HAIROTICMENâ€™s brand presence, generate leads, and maximize return on ad spend (ROAS) through intelligent automation and continuous learning. Its core goals include optimizing campaigns, producing content aligned with brand identity, and providing actionable insights to management.2) Core Responsibilitiesâ€¢ Plan and automate marketing campaigns across Meta, Google, TikTok, and email.  â€¢ Generate and refine ad creatives, captions, and SEO texts aligned with HAIROTICMEN tone.  â€¢ Analyze campaign performance and adjust targeting parameters automatically.  â€¢ Produce SEO reports for product pages and blog content.  â€¢ Manage content publishing calendar and coordinate with Sales and Partner AI.  â€¢ Record all campaign data and assets into Google Drive for auditing and reuse.  3) Data Sources and OwnershipPrimary Data Sources:  â€¢ Google Drive (/Marketing/Content/, /Marketing/Reports/, /Marketing/Ads/).  â€¢ Meta Ads Manager (Facebook &amp; Instagram).  â€¢ Google Ads, TikTok Ads, and YouTube Studio.  â€¢ Monday.com (Marketing Dashboard).  â€¢ Odoo CRM (leads and customer analytics).  Ownership:  â€¢ The Marketing AI Agent owns campaign metadata, creative assets, and performance metrics.  â€¢ All leads generated through campaigns are mirrored in Odoo CRM under the Sales domain.  4) Event Triggersâ€¢ New campaign or post scheduled in Monday.  â€¢ Ad spend threshold reached or ROAS drops below policy level.  â€¢ New product or promotion added to WooCommerce.  â€¢ Periodic daily trigger (content publishing, analytics refresh).  â€¢ Manual query from Hairo Assistant (â€œShow top-performing campaignâ€, â€œGenerate Instagram post for Beard Oilâ€).  5) MCP Tools Utilizedâ€¢ drive.search_docs: Retrieve existing marketing assets and templates from Drive.â€¢ drive.append_note: Log campaign results, performance, and creative changes.â€¢ monday.create_item: Update Monday board with campaign KPIs and creative pipeline tasks.â€¢ crm.create_ticket: Submit marketing requests or creative briefs for approval in Odoo CRM.â€¢ woo.list_orders: Read sales data to correlate campaign performance with conversions.6) Automation Flows (Zapier + n8n)â€¢ Zapier Automations:    â€“ Meta Ads â†’ Odoo CRM Lead Intake â†’ Monday â€œCampaign Leadsâ€ board update.    â€“ Google Ads Performance â†’ Drive Report Generation â†’ Email summary to management.    â€“ TikTok &amp; Instagram Publishing â†’ Schedule posts automatically using calendar events.  â€¢ n8n Automations:    â€“ Daily SEO Check: analyze product pages and update â€œSEO Scorecardâ€ in Drive.    â€“ Ad Budget Control: monitor ad accounts; if spend exceeds threshold, pause campaign and notify Hairo Assistant.    â€“ Report Consolidation: aggregate weekly ad metrics from all platforms and export unified CSV to Drive.  7) AI Reasoning &amp; Creative Workflow1. Observe â†’ Gather ad performance data and brand content updates.  2. Analyze â†’ Compare current ROAS, CTR, and engagement to previous periods.  3. Decide â†’ Adjust targeting or suggest new creative directions.  4. Act â†’ Generate ad copy, visuals (via integrated generative model), and schedule posts.  5. Reflect â†’ Log outcomes and learning notes in Drive for continuous improvement.  All content suggestions and ad copies follow HAIROTICMENâ€™s official tone and visual identity.  8) SEO and Analytics Intelligenceâ€¢ The AI monitors keyword rankings, backlink profiles, and search trends.  â€¢ Generates SEO optimization reports for product and blog pages.  â€¢ Suggests metadata improvements and internal linking strategies.  â€¢ Maintains Drive file â€œSEO_Performance_Report_{month}.xlsxâ€ with keyword and traffic summaries.  â€¢ Coordinates with Sales AI to align product descriptions with search demand.  9) KPIs and MonitoringMarketing AI KPIs (reported to Monday):  â€¢ ROAS (Return on Ad Spend).  â€¢ CTR (Click-Through Rate).  â€¢ Conversion Rate (% of leads converted).  â€¢ Engagement Rate (likes/comments/shares).  â€¢ Content Output (posts per week).  â€¢ SEO Visibility Index.
